'''"Tea Harvest's Multifunction Rack"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tea Harvest's Multifunction Rack" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Bamboo Segment = 8
|Fragrant Cedar Wood = 2
|sort = Bamboo Segment; Fragrant Cedar Wood
}}
